body: can a mod please ask someone to fix the player menu colors. :)
body_tagged: can a mod please ask someone to fix the player menu colors. :)
title: No Team Color Coded names  anymore?

replies.body: It might just be your minecraft, you know?
replies.body_tagged: It might just be your minecraft, you know?

replies.body: What Awarrior said, you could've changed the Minecraft Setting as Colors:On to Colors:Off. You can find that under the Multiplayer Settings.
replies.body_tagged: What Awarrior said, you could've changed the Minecraft Setting as Colors:On to Colors:Off. You can find that under the Multiplayer Settings.

replies.body: oooooo i thought it was a glitch
